Lyndem Edutainment

is an educational service provider that engenders learning through the art of interactive play using educational games and activities

About Us

Lyndem is an interactive educational centre where children are encouraged to discover their intellectual abilities through the art of gameplay. We expose them to educational games of different sorts which challenges their innate desire to learn and stir up their interest in a variety of topics.

EduGaming

Game Schooling

Play To Learn

Our Mission

Our main goal is to infuse fun into the learning process making it an enjoyable experience for the kids so they become eager learners

What We Do

We offer quite a lot of services that revolve around who we are. We run an Educational Games Cafe, Organize Play Dates, Game Schooling Events and Edu Gaming Themed Birthday Parties

Game Schooling

Gameschooling is where intentional and specific games are used to teach specific skills, rather than just playing games haphazardly for entertainment. The philosophy behind gameschooling is that kids remember best what they choose to learn.

At Lyndem Edutainment we use games to teach educational and life skills.
